TIDY5E.Group.EmptyMembersTabHint: This group is empty. Drop an actor from the sidebar to add a member.

TIDY5E.Actions.OverriddenSetOverrideFalse: Remove from Actions List (Shift+Click to clear override)
TIDY5E.Actions.OverriddenSetOverrideTrue: Add to Actions List (Shift+Click to clear override)

TIDY5E.SheetEdit.Description: Toggle visibility of add/delete buttons and empty sections
TIDY5E.SheetLock.Description: Toggle lock for sensitive fields that should not change often
TIDY5E.EmptySection: This section is empty. Unlock the sheet to edit.
TIDY5E.GMOnlyEdit: Only your GM can edit this section.
TIDY5E.AttunementWarning: Attunement: Unable to attune to more than {number} items.
TIDY5E.SearchHint: Start typing to show search results
TIDY5E.SpellSourceIdentifierLabelHint: The actor who has this spell does not have the source class that is specified here.

TIDY5E.TabSelection.Title: Tab Selection: {documentName}
TIDY5E.TabSelection.UnsupportedDocumentErrorMessage: The document type {documentType} is not currently set up for tab selection.
TIDY5E.TabSelection.AtLeastOneRequiredErrorMessage: At least one tab is required.
TIDY5E.TabSelection.Explanation: Any tabs that the user or sheet are configured not to see (e.g., disabling the journal in config settings) will still not appear on the sheet, even if selected.

TIDY5E.WorldSettings.Exhaustion.name: Exhaustion Configuration
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.Exhaustion.hint: Determines how non-vehicle exhaustion is configured and presented on the character and NPC sheets.
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.Exhaustion.options.specific.levels.name: Total Levels
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.Exhaustion.options.specific.levels.hint: Determines the maximum number of levels of exhaustion.
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.Exhaustion.options.specific.levels.tooltip.name: Exhaustion Level {level} Tooltip
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.Exhaustion.options.specific.levels.tooltip.hint: Tooltip for this level of exhaustion. Localization keys also work.
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.Exhaustion.options.open.explanation: Shows the user a numeric input for entering levels of exhaustion.
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.Exhaustion.AtLeastOneLevelRequiredErrorMessage: At least one exhaustion level is required.

TIDY5E.WorldSettings.VehicleExhaustion.name: Vehicular Exhaustion Configuration
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.VehicleExhaustion.hint: Determines how vehicle exhaustion is configured and presented on the vehicle sheet.
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.VehicleExhaustion.AtLeastOneLevelRequiredErrorMessage: At least one vehicle exhaustion level is required.

TIDY5E.WorldSettings.IncludeTidySectionF.name: Include Tidy Section Fields in Default Sheets
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.IncludeTidySectionF.hint: Includes Tidy Section and Action Section inputs in the default item sheets.

TIDY5E.WorldSettings.ItemIdentificationP.name: Item Identification Permission
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.ItemIdentificationP.hint: Determines which type of user is able to access the UI controls for identifying items.

TIDY5E.WorldSettings.IncludeFlagsInSpell.name: Include Flags in Spell Scroll Creation
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.IncludeFlagsInSpell.hint: Spells can sometimes contain special data from other modules which can be useful to carry over into a spell scroll. Enable to copy all flag-based data to the spell scroll upon creation.

TIDY5E.WorldSettings.TabSheetLock.hint: Prevent players from making changes to aspects of their character sheets that should change infrequently. Optionally hide some elements that you don't want to use at all.
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.TabSheetLock.hint2: Important: sheet lock features are intended to guide player sheet use and to help prevent mistakes such as accidentally adding/removing a saving throw proficiency. Sheet lock settings do not provide a secure lockdown against players with malicious intent.

TIDY5E.WorldSettings.TabCustomSections.ShowWhenEmptyTooltip: All tabs with item tables have a set of default sections which are always shown even when there are no items in the section. Always show this section, even when empty.
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.TabCustomSections.LimitToSpecificSheetsLabel: Limit Shown Section to Specific Sheets
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.TabCustomSections.LimitToSpecificTabsLabel: Limit Shown Section to Specific Tabs

TIDY5E.WorldSettings.Menu.name: World Settings
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.Menu.hint: Adjust world-level settings to customize the Tidy 5e Sheets experience. These settings are saved to this Foundry world and apply to all relevant Tidy 5e Sheets content.
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.Menu.label: World Settings
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.Menu.title: World Settings (GM Only)

TIDY5E.UserSettings.Menu.name: User Settings
TIDY5E.UserSettings.Menu.hint: Customize your own version of Tidy 5e Sheets. These settings are saved to your browser and apply to your sheets.
TIDY5E.UserSettings.Menu.label: User Settings
TIDY5E.UserSettings.Menu.title: User Settings: {userName}

TIDY5E.Settings.ItemCardsForAllItems.name: Show Item Cards in All Layouts
TIDY5E.Settings.ItemCardsForAllItems.hint: When this setting is disabled, item cards only show in the grid.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseEffectCards.name: Show Active Effect Info Cards
TIDY5E.Settings.UseEffectCards.hint: Enable to show info cards for active effects on all actors and items with active effects.

TIDY5E.Settings.ItemCardsAreFloating.name: Show Floating Item Cards
TIDY5E.Settings.ItemCardsAreFloating.hint: Enable to have item info cards float next to the mouse cursor. Recommended: use delay with this feature.

TIDY5E.Settings.ItemCardsDelay.name: Item Card Delay (ms)
TIDY5E.Settings.ItemCardsDelay.hint: Delays showing item cards for the specified milliseconds (ms). 0 means no delay. Default: 300.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseAccessibleKeyboardSup.name: Use Accessible Keyboard Support
TIDY5E.Settings.UseAccessibleKeyboardSup.hint: Enables users to tab through most of the buttons/commands on Tidy 5e Sheets and execute them with conventional button-based keyboard hotkeys. Note: when focused on a button in Foundry, keybindings from "Configure Controls" do not respond. If a module uses this Foundry feature for controls on the sheets, such as using items while holding a special key, then enabling this Tidy 5e Sheets option will interfere with those keybindings.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseDefaultSheetAttribute.name: Use default sheet attribute keyboard tabbing
TIDY5E.Settings.UseDefaultSheetAttribute.hint: The default 5e sheet allows keyboard tabbing from one attribute input to the next by hiding the controls around them from the tab order. Enabling this replicates that behaviour. This setting is ignored if "Use Accessible Keyboard Support" is turned off.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseDefaultSheetHpTabbing.name: Use default sheet HP keyboard tabbing
TIDY5E.Settings.UseDefaultSheetHpTabbing.hint: The default 5e sheet allows keyboard tabbing from the current HP input to the current temp HP input. Enabling this replicates that behaviour. This setting is ignored if "Use Accessible Keyboard Support" is turned off.

TIDY5E.Settings.InfoCardsInspectKey.name: Info Card Inspect Key
TIDY5E.Settings.InfoCardsInspectKey.hint: Press this keyboard character (for example, the "t" key) while viewing an info card to pop it out.

TIDY5E.Settings.DefaultTheme.name: Default Color Theme
TIDY5E.Settings.DefaultTheme.hint: The default theme for all users who do not have a specific theme selected.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseClassicControls.name: Use Classic List Controls
TIDY5E.Settings.UseClassicControls.hint: Shows controls in the list view.

TIDY5E.Settings.ShowTraitLabels.name: Show Trait Labels
TIDY5E.Settings.ShowTraitLabels.hint: Shows labels for PC, NPC, and Vehicle traits. Disable to show only icons.

TIDY5E.Settings.ShowPlayerName.name: Show Player Name
TIDY5E.Settings.ShowPlayerName.hint: Shows a field for the player name below the character's name.

TIDY5E.Settings.ShowClassList.name: Show Class List
TIDY5E.Settings.ShowClassList.hint: Shows the class list below the character's name.

TIDY5E.Settings.HideIfZero.name: Hide Exhaustion and Inspiration Tracker on 0
TIDY5E.Settings.HideIfZero.hint: Hides exhaustion and inspiration if 0 but still shows on hover.

TIDY5E.Settings.ShowInspirationOnHover.name: Show Inspiration Indicator Only on Hover
TIDY5E.Settings.ShowInspirationOnHover.hint: Shows the inspiration indicator only when hovering over the portrait.

TIDY5E.Settings.ShowExhaustionOnHover.name: Show Exhaustion Tracker Only on Hover
TIDY5E.Settings.ShowExhaustionOnHover.hint: Shows the exhaustion tracker only when hovering over the portrait.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseHpBar.name: Use HP Bar
TIDY5E.Settings.UseHpBar.hint: Shows a colored bar indicating remaining HP. Health numbers will still be visible.

TIDY5E.Settings.ToggleEmptyCharacterSkil.name: Toggle Empty Character Skills
TIDY5E.Settings.ToggleEmptyCharacterSkil.hint: Adds a toggle button for showing/hiding empty skills.

TIDY5E.Settings.MoveTraitsToRightOfSkill.name: Move Traits to Right of Skills
TIDY5E.Settings.MoveTraitsToRightOfSkill.hint: Positions traits to the right of the skill list, above most other UIs on the right side (e.g. Favorites, NPC Abilities).

TIDY5E.Settings.ShowEquippedAmmoOnly.name: Show Equipped Ammunition Only
TIDY5E.Settings.ShowEquippedAmmoOnly.hint: Shows only currently equipped ammunition in the weapon ammo selector.

TIDY5E.Settings.AlwaysShowSkills.name: Always Show Skills
TIDY5E.Settings.AlwaysShowSkills.hint: Removes the visibility toggle button for non-proficient skills and shows all.

TIDY5E.Settings.ShowNPCSpellbookTab.name: Show Spellbook Tab
TIDY5E.Settings.ShowNPCSpellbookTab.hint: Shows a spellbook tab for NPCs. Disable to move the spellbook section to the Attributes tab.

TIDY5E.Settings.ShowActiveEffectsMarker.name: Show Active Effects Marker
TIDY5E.Settings.ShowActiveEffectsMarker.hint: Shows a marker for list view items that have active effects.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseContextMenu.name: Use Context Menu
TIDY5E.Settings.UseContextMenu.hint: Enables right-click context menu on items.

TIDY5E.Settings.ShowExpandedLimitedView.name: Show Expanded Limited View
TIDY5E.Settings.ShowExpandedLimitedView.hint: Displays the entire sheet (minus the journal) to players with limited permission.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseTotalSheetLock.name: Lock Down Sensitive Fields
TIDY5E.Settings.UseTotalSheetLock.hint: Locks infrequently changed fields (name, proficiency toggles) and hides configuration buttons when the sheet is locked.

TIDY5E.Settings.LimitEffectsManagementTo.name: Limit Active Effects Management to GMs
TIDY5E.Settings.LimitEffectsManagementTo.hint: Limits permission to edit or toggle active effects to GMs only.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseInspiration.name: Use Inspiration Tracker
TIDY5E.Settings.UseInspiration.hint: Shows an inspiration tracker on the character profile.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseVehicleMotion.name: Use Vehicle Motion Tracker
TIDY5E.Settings.UseVehicleMotion.hint: Shows a motion tracker on the vehicle profile.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseExhaustion.name: Use Exhaustion Tracker
TIDY5E.Settings.UseExhaustion.hint: Shows an exhaustion tracker for characters, NPCs, and vehicles.

TIDY5E.Settings.ShowNPCRestInChat.name: Show NPC Rest in Chat
TIDY5E.Settings.ShowNPCRestInChat.hint: Shows a chat card when an NPC rests.

TIDY5E.Settings.ShowNPCActorLinkMarker.name: Mark Linked/Unlinked NPCs
TIDY5E.Settings.ShowNPCActorLinkMarker.hint: Adds a colored border and icon to linked/unlinked NPC sheets.

TIDY5E.Settings.InitialSheetTab.name: Initial Sheet Tab
TIDY5E.Settings.InitialSheetTab.hint: Shows the indicated tab when opening a sheet for the first time.

TIDY5E.Settings.DefaultSheetTabs.name: Default Sheet Tabs
TIDY5E.Settings.DefaultSheetTabs.hint: Determines which tabs will show and in what order by default. Applies when no tab selections have been made for an actor.
TIDY5E.Settings.DefaultSheetTabs.AtLeastOneTabRequiredErrorMessage: Default tabs: at least one tab is required for each actor type.

TIDY5E.Settings.HideDeathSavesFromPlayer.name: Hide Death Saves From Players
TIDY5E.Settings.HideDeathSavesFromPlayer.hint: Makes death save totals visible only to the GM. The death save roll button remains visible.

TIDY5E.Settings.DefaultDeathSaveRoll.name: Default Death Save Roll
TIDY5E.Settings.DefaultDeathSaveRoll.hint: Determines the default roll type to use when rolling a death saving throw.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseCharacterEncumbranceB.name: Use Character Encumbrance Bar
TIDY5E.Settings.UseCharacterEncumbranceB.hint: Shows an encumbrance bar on character sheets.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseNPCEncumbranceBar.name: Use NPC Encumbrance Bar
TIDY5E.Settings.UseNPCEncumbranceBar.hint: Shows an encumbrance bar on NPC sheets.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseVehicleEncumbranceBar.name: Use Vehicle Encumbrance Bar
TIDY5E.Settings.UseVehicleEncumbranceBar.hint: Shows an encumbrance bar on vehicle sheets.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseMulticlassSpellbookFi.name: Use Multiclass Spellbook Filter
TIDY5E.Settings.UseMulticlassSpellbookFi.hint: Allows filtering spells by class in the spellbook tab. The spell must be associated with a class using the Class selector on the spell edit sheet.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseSpellClassIcons.name: Use Spell Class Icon for Spells
TIDY5E.Settings.UseSpellClassIcons.hint: Shows spell class's image on spells instead of the spell's own image. The spell must be associated with a class using the Class selector on the spell edit sheet. When multiclassing, this feature distinguishes which spells belong to which class at a glance.

TIDY5E.Settings.AllowCantripsToBePrepare.name: Allow Cantrips to be Prepared
TIDY5E.Settings.AllowCantripsToBePrepare.hint: The "cantrip formulas" optional rule from Tasha's Cauldron of Everything allows wizards to prepare cantrips after a long rest in the same way that they do with leveled spells. Prepared cantrips do not count toward total prepared spells.

TIDY5E.Settings.LockMoneyChanges.name: Lock Currency
TIDY5E.Settings.LockMoneyChanges.hint: Prevents non-GMs from making changes to currency.

TIDY5E.Settings.LockExpChanges.name: Lock Experience
TIDY5E.Settings.LockExpChanges.hint: Prevents non-GMs from making changes to experience.

TIDY5E.Settings.LockHpMaxChanges.name: Lock Max HP Changes
TIDY5E.Settings.LockHpMaxChanges.hint: Prevents non-GMs from making changes to max HP.

TIDY5E.Settings.LockLevelSelector.name: Lock Level Selector
TIDY5E.Settings.LockLevelSelector.hint: Prevents non-GMs from changing player levels with the class level selector.

TIDY5E.Settings.LockConfigureSheet.name: Lock Sheet Selection
TIDY5E.Settings.LockConfigureSheet.hint: Prevents non-GMs from selecting another sheet layout.

TIDY5E.Settings.LockItemQuantity.name: Lock Item Quantity
TIDY5E.Settings.LockItemQuantity.hint: Prevents non-GMs from making changes to item quantity.

TIDY5E.Settings.ActionListLimitActionsTo.name: Limit Actions to Cantrips
TIDY5E.Settings.ActionListLimitActionsTo.hint: Instead of showing all spells that deal damage in the Actions tab/panel by default, limits to only cantrips. This is the default D&DBeyond behavior.

TIDY5E.Settings.ActionListIncludeMinuteL.name: Include Minute-long Spells as Actions
TIDY5E.Settings.ActionListIncludeMinuteL.hint: Includes spells with a duration of one minute or less (e.g. 1 round) and an activation time of 1 Action or 1 Bonus Action (e.g. Bless, Bane, Command) in the Actions tab/panel by default.

TIDY5E.Settings.ActionListIncludeSpellsW.name: Include Spells with Active Effects as Actions
TIDY5E.Settings.ActionListIncludeSpellsW.hint: Includes spells with active effects attached (e.g. Barkskin) in the Actions tab/panel by default.

TIDY5E.Settings.ActionListIncludeConsuma.name: Include Consumables as Actions
TIDY5E.Settings.ActionListIncludeConsuma.hint: Includes consumables which have an activation cost (Action, Bonus Action, etc) in the Actions list by default.

TIDY5E.Settings.AllowHpMaxOverride.name: Allow HP Max Override on Character
TIDY5E.Settings.AllowHpMaxOverride.hint: Allows the GM to manually change max HP on the character sheet.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseTidySpellSchoolIcons.name: Use Tidy Spell School Icons
TIDY5E.Settings.UseTidySpellSchoolIcons.hint: Use Tidy's handpicked icons for spell schools. To customize spell school icons through CONFIG.DND5E or through other modules, disable this option. To extend Tidy's custom spell school icons, refer to the Tidy API documentation.

TIDY5E.Settings.InlineActivitiesPosition.name: Inline Activities Position
TIDY5E.Settings.InlineActivitiesPosition.hint: When expanding an item, activities for that item are shown. Use this setting to determine if activities are put at the top, before the item description, or bottom, below the item description, buttons, and tags.

TIDY5E.Settings.Reset.name: Reset Settings to Default
TIDY5E.Settings.Reset.hint: This will reset all of the settings of back to the active game system's default. This affects "world"-scoped settings only, such as GM options.

dialogs.title: Reset Module Settings
dialogs.content: Are you sure you want to reset all of the module settings to the current system's defaults? This cannot be undone.

TIDY5E.Settings.Migrations.name: Migrations
TIDY5E.Settings.Migrations.hint: If you were a user of the original Tidy5e Sheet module, optionally use this Migrations menu to migrate your GM settings and Tidy sheet data.
TIDY5E.Settings.Migrations.chatNotification: A new Tidy 5e Sheets migration is available. See Tidy 5e Sheets Game Settings to view available migrations.
TIDY5E.Settings.Migrations.migrationBeginningMessage: Migrating data. Please do not refresh the page until done.
TIDY5E.Settings.Migrations.migrationErrorMessage: An error occurred. More details are in the dev console.
TIDY5E.Settings.Migrations.migrateConfirmMessage1: Are you sure you wish to perform this migration?
TIDY5E.Settings.Migrations.migrateConfirmMessage2: {boldStart}Note{boldEnd}: always remember to {boldStart}back up your data{boldEnd}.
TIDY5E.Settings.Migrations.OptionOverwrite.Tooltip: Enable to overwrite existing sheet data. If unchecked, only empty system fields will receive migrated Tidy data.
TIDY5E.Settings.Migrations.OptionDeleteFlags.Tooltip: When migrating from custom Tidy flag data to official system data, the flags remain in place by default. Check this option to remove those flags.
TIDY5E.Settings.Migrations.MigrateCompendia.Title: Migrate Compendia

CcssToTidy.explanation1: Tidy 5e now natively supports custom sections and provides additional features around custom sections. This migration will copy Custom Character Sheet Sections (CCSS) section names into Tidy's section setup.
CcssToTidy.overwriteTooltip: Enable to overwrite existing Tidy section flag. If unchecked, only empty Tidy flags will receive migrated CCSS data.
CcssToTidy.deleteFlagsTooltip: When migrating from CCSS to Tidy custom sections, the CCSS flags remain in place by default. Check this option to remove those flags.

TIDY5E.Settings.Migrations.UnlinkedExplanation: This migration gives the option to migrate unlinked token documents in the current scene. You can run the migration on additional scenes as needed.

TIDY5E.Settings.SheetPreferences.name: Set Tidy as Default Sheet
TIDY5E.Settings.SheetPreferences.hint: If you would like to set Tidy 5e Sheets as your default for one or more document types, but the core default sheets config menu is not working as expected, use this menu to select your preferences.
TIDY5E.Settings.SheetPreferences.explanation: Select all document types where you would prefer Tidy 5e Sheets to be the default.

TIDY5E.Settings.About.name: About
TIDY5E.Settings.About.hint: Information about the Tidy 5e Sheets module.
TIDY5E.Settings.About.logoAltText: A heater shield with four stars and the words 'Tidy 5e' on the front.
TIDY5E.Settings.About.GithubParagraph: Do you have a feature idea? Is something wrong? Submit a {urlStart}Github Issue{urlEnd}.
TIDY5E.Settings.About.DiscordParagraph: {urlStart}Tidy 5e Sheets Discord Server{urlEnd}: Discuss new feature ideas, get help from others, and track progress of this module.
TIDY5E.Settings.About.LocalizationParagraph: {urlStart}Weblate{urlEnd}: Do you localize web content? Tidy 5e Sheets could use your help! Go to the Weblate website to see our localization progress in various languages. This module is accepting new language translations and modifications to existing translations.
TIDY5E.Settings.About.FinancialSupportParagraph: If you like Tidy 5e Sheets and want to support it financially, here are some ways to do it:

TIDY5E.Settings.GlobalCustomSections.name: Global Custom Sections
TIDY5E.Settings.GlobalCustomSections.hint: World custom sections which can be configured for various purposes. Global Custom Sections will always be included in the Section Selector.

TIDY5E.Settings.Debug.name: Enable Debugging
TIDY5E.Settings.Debug.hint: Prints debug messages to the console.

TIDY5E.Settings.PermanentlyUnlockCharact.name: Character Sheet: Always Unlocked for GM
TIDY5E.Settings.PermanentlyUnlockCharact.hint: Treat the character sheet as though it were always unlocked, regardless of the lock setting. The GM can always edit the character, but they can also toggle lock/unlock for a player who also owns the character.
TIDY5E.Settings.PermanentlyUnlockCharact.title: This sheet is always unlocked for the GM, regardless of the lock setting.

TIDY5E.Settings.PermanentlyUnlockNPCShee.name: NPC Sheet: Always Unlocked for GM
TIDY5E.Settings.PermanentlyUnlockNPCShee.hint: Treat the NPC sheet as though it were always unlocked, regardless of the lock setting. The GM can always edit the NPC, but they can also toggle lock/unlock for a player who also owns the NPC.
TIDY5E.Settings.PermanentlyUnlockNPCShee.title: This sheet is always unlocked for the GM, regardless of the lock setting.

TIDY5E.Settings.PermanentlyUnlockVehicle.name: Vehicle Sheet: Always Unlocked for GM
TIDY5E.Settings.PermanentlyUnlockVehicle.hint: Treat the vehicle sheet as though it were always unlocked, regardless of the lock setting. The GM can always edit the vehicle, but they can also toggle lock/unlock for a player who also owns the vehicle.
TIDY5E.Settings.PermanentlyUnlockVehicle.title: This sheet is always unlocked for the GM, regardless of the lock setting.

SheetMenu.name: Tidy Theme Settings
SheetMenu.hint: Customize the colors of Tidy 5e Sheets.

Sheet.title: Theme Settings: {userName}
Sheet.importDropHint: Hint: You can drag a ".tidy5e-theme" file onto this form to import it.
Sheet.importError: Theme import failed. See console for more details.
Sheet.explanation: Select what color you wish to use for each option. The value "#00000000" is equivalent to disabling the color.

TIDY5E.ReminderToBackUp: Always remember to back up your world.
TIDY5E.GenericErrorNotification: An error occurred while performing this action. See the devtools console for more details.

TIDY5E.Section.Label: Section
TIDY5E.Section.Tooltip: Specify a custom section for this item when placed in an actor sheet, or leave it blank for default behavior.
TIDY5E.Section.ActionTooltip: Specify a custom section for this item when placed in the Actions tab, or leave it blank for default behavior.

TIDY5E.UseDefaultDialog.title: Confirm: Use Default
TIDY5E.UseDefaultDialog.text: Are you sure you wish to use default?

TIDY5E.RollRecharge.Hint: {rechargeLabel} (Shift+Click to skip the roll and instantly recharge)
TIDY5E.SpellSourceClassAssignments.Ident: The spell's source class identifier appears here. To assign an identifier which the character doesn't own, enter the class identifier in this text field.
TIDY5E.Keybindings.ToggleSheetLock.Name: Toggle Sheet Lock
TIDY5E.Keybindings.ToggleSheetLock.Hint: If a Tidy sheet is the current active window in the UI, this keybinding toggles the sheet lock.
TIDY5E.Keybindings.ToggleHeaderMenu.Name: Toggle Header Menu
TIDY5E.Keybindings.ToggleHeaderMenu.Hint: If a Tidy sheet is the current active window in the UI, this keybinding toggles the sheet header menu.
TIDY5E.Facilities.Hirelings.Label: Hirelings
TIDY5E.Facilities.Defenders.Label: Defenders
TIDY5E.Facilities.Creatures.Label: Creatures
TIDY5E.Facilities.RosterMember.Label: {actorName} - {facilityName}
